title: Why Must I be Level 7 or Higher to Post In Some Places?
body: I've been playing League of Legend's for a year and then some now, and yet despite watching a season come and go along with my friends rising up to gold while I sit as unranked because i'm a pleb and don't have the time, I still can't find a proper place to throw ideas for champ's, items, etc because of this level restriction that doesn't seem to be associated with the actual game account. I figure if I wasn't invested or wanted to be a troll that I wouldn't have a level 30 account along with more then a year under my belt, so is there anyway to get to the point where you can post any topic under any sub forum without this random level restriction?

replies.body:
The main reason behind those level restrictions is to help avoid certain types of spammers I believe. If someone were able to post anywhere at any level, there would most likely be a higher volume of hackers posting phishing links in an attempt to steal accounts. 

It looks like you're level 30 now, so you *should* be able to post anywhere!
Indeed I can post anywhere now, if you happen to have fixed something then thank you :D
